mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_home_search ( TABLE_ID, TABLE_NAME, TITLE, MAIN_CHAR ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{tableName}, #{title}, #{mainChar} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.ID id, t.TABLE_ID tableId, t.TABLE_NAME tableName, t.TITLE title, t.MAIN_CHAR mainChar FROM t_home_search t WHERE t.TITLE like concat(concat('%',#{title}),'%')
